text: "The Discarded" (1959) is a short story by Harlan Ellison. A television adaptation directed by Jonathan Frakes was broadcast in the US on August 25, 2007, as an episode of Masters of Science Fiction. ==See also== *List of sources for anthology series == Notes == Category:1959 short stories Category:Science fiction short stories Category:Short stories by Harlan Ellison
title: The Discarded
